Uses of Package
org.cougaar.bootstrap

Packages that use org.cougaar.bootstrap
org.cougaar.bootstrap Provides an extensible utility for starting an application composed from a complex set of jars. 
 

Classes in org.cougaar.bootstrap used by org.cougaar.bootstrap
Bootstrapper
          A main(String[] args) class that searches for classes and jar files in a path, creates an XURLClassLoader that uses the found jars, and launches an application class (typically a Cougaar Node).
CommandLine.CommandData
          Java command data, including the -Ds
XURLClassLoader
          This class loader is used to load classes and resources from a search path of URLs referring to both JAR files and directories.
